plugins.name: change-log
plugins.description: Generates a comprehensive Change Log for Jira-based feature branches and publishes it to Confluence when merging to develop. Requires Atlassian MCP plugin.

plugins.name: api-codegen
plugins.description: Generate production-ready API client code from Swagger/OpenAPI by analyzing project environment and asking for clarification

plugins.name: api-integration
plugins.description: Swagger/OpenAPI를 분석하여 상세한 실행 계획 → 백엔드 API 클라이언트 → 프론트엔드 API 클라이언트를 자동 생성. Planner, Backend, Frontend 서브에이전트로 전 과정 자동화. Kotlin/Spring, React/TypeScript, Next.js 지원.
